Name: Adventures of Robinson Crusoe
About the game: Inspired by Daniel Defoe’s classic masterpiece, Robinson Crusoe is a story of a man who survives a terrible shipwreck and finds himself cast away on an island in the Caribbean. In this incredible hidden object adventure that spans over 28 years, help Robinson explore the island, fight with cannibals, visit a lost village and construct a boat to sail back home! - Two game play modes – Relaxed and Survivor - 31 unique levels - 36 unique locations to explore, from a wrecked ship to desolated well. - Fun adventure spirit! - Based on the classic novel by Daniel Defoe
